page.title: 03FAMILY LIFE.
page.content: 06:00 Mum and my brother get up and wash. 06:15-07:00 Mum makes dad's sandwiches and also she has breakfast. 06:30 My Brother has breakfast. 07:00 I get up and wash. 07:15 My brother leaves for Sainsburys,while my other brother wakes up and has breakfast. 07:30 Mum wakes Dad and cooks his breakfast. 08:15 Dad leaves for the estate agency in Bicester. 08:30 Mum and I go to the market. 10:00-12:00 I watch television,Mum cleans the house and my brother goes out. 12:30 I have dinner. P.M. I play with my friends while Mum works in the house. 11:00 I go to bed.
